code: import{getItem}from"../utils/localStorage";import moment from"moment";export var logout=function logout(){localStorage.clear();window.location.href="/";};export var checkLogin=function checkLogin(){var TOKEN=getItem("auth_token");if(TOKEN!==undefined||TOKEN!==null){return false;}else{return true;}};export function convertDateTimeFormat(datestring){if(datestring!==null&&datestring!==""){return datestring.substr(5,2)+"/"+datestring.substr(8,2)+"/"+datestring.substr(0,4);}else{return"N/A";}}export function format(datetime,formatter,givenFormatter){var givenTimezoneOffset=moment.parseZone(datetime).utcOffset();if(givenTimezoneOffset!==0){return moment(datetime,givenFormatter).utcOffset(givenTimezoneOffset).format(formatter);}else{}}export function parseDate(date){if(!date)return null;var dateComponent=format(new Date(date),"MMM D");return dateComponent;}export function mmddyy(value){var dateComponent=format(new Date(value),"MM/DD/YYYY");return dateComponent;}
